description:
The 2021 Little League World Series is scheduled to take place during August 19–29, 2021, at the Little League headquarters complex in South Williamsport, Pennsylvania. Due to the COVID-19 pandemic, the event is limited to US-based teams only. The most recent prior edition of the tournament contested without international teams was 1975.
On August 13, it was announced that tickets would not be distributed to the public due to concerns over the Delta variant, with spectators limited to invited friends and family of teams, and other high-level supporters.
title: 2021 Little League World Series
